archimate:DataObject.name: CompProdCorrelationCharacteristic
archimate:DataObject.documentation: A characteristic quality or distinctive feature of a CompetitorProductCorrelation. The characteristic can be take on a discrete value; such as geographic disbursement (central; national; cascading); can take on a range of values; (for example; Competitor ProductOffering revenue of $500;000 - $1;000;000); or can be derived from a formula (for example; number of MarketSegments in correlation = number of MarketSegments related to this correlation).
